titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2492) making appropriations for the government of the District of Columbia and other activities chargeable in whole or in part against the revenues of said District for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1994, and for other purposes.

action.text: Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 2492. All points of order against the conference report are waived. The motions printed in the joint explanatory statement of the committee of conference to dispose of amendments in disagreement shall be considered as read.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-308, by Mr. Derrick.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 105.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 239 - 187 (Roll no. 533).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/26/1993--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 2492 (District of Columbia government appropriations).
